PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-03312017-04-12,  ISED,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Small Business and Tourism of PATRICIA (PAT) MACDONALD of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, in the place of Nora M. Duke, whose term has expired.
